content: r the flight| |predictedPax| | | |N/A in the source system.| |suffix| | | |The field is set to `*` in the flow.| |udor| |`FlightManifest`|`<DepartureDate>`|Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD| |flightLegId|`schedops.LEG`| |`LEG_NO`| | |noShowPax| |`CustomerManifest`|`<NoShowCount>`| | |numberOfBookedChildPassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<ChildManifested>`| | |numberOfBookedFemalePassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<FemaleManifested>`| | |numberOfBookedInfantPassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<InfManifested>`| | |numberOfBookedMalePassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<MaleManifested>`| | |numberOfCheckedChildPassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<ChildCheckedin>`|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |numberOfCheckedFemalePassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<FemaleCheckedin>`|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |numberOfCheckedInfantPassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<InfCheckedin>`|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |numberOfCheckedMalePassengers| |`CustomerManifest`|`<MaleCheckedin>`|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |totalBoardedPax| |`CustomerManifest`|`<TotalHeadsOnBoard>`| | |specialServices| | | | | | extraInfo| | | | | | ssrCode| |`FlightManifest`|`<SSRCode>`|Group by `<SSRCode>`| | numberOfRequest| | | |Count SSR requests grouped by `<SSRCode>`| |fareBasisCodes| | | | | | extraInfo| | | | | | fareBasis| |`FlightManifest`|`<FareBasis>`|Group by `<FareBasis>`| | numberOfCodes| | | |Count codes grouped by `<FareBasis>`| # Pax Boarding Summary Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Flight leg list conditions(From 180 minutes before the departure time, to 40 minutes after the departure time); * (`schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` - 180 minutes <= Current Date(UTC) <= `schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` + 40 minutes) * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = (“C“ or “J“ or “O“) and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “DEL“ or “INC“) #### - Source Service * `FlightManifest` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_Booking_WS/services/FlightPort` * Met
